subject: Olympic Games (2008)
Doping
Track and Field
lead_paragraph: Asafa Powell and Usain Bolt say they are being subjected to an unusual number of drug tests and that each time they are tested, the procedure can disrupt their training.
snippet: Asafa Powell and Usain Bolt say they are being subjected to an unusual number of drug tests and that each time they are tested, the procedure can disrupt their training.
